data.title: Break Up / Delay B Main Push from B Link
data.description: Use this to break up / delay the Attacker's B Main Execute.

data.title: Safely Defend A Site + Delay Spike Plant
data.description: Use this setup to defend A Site + delay spike plant.

data.title: Simple B Main Delay Mosh Pit
data.description: Use this simple B Main Delay Mosh Pit to make it difficult for the Attackers to push through the B Main / B Site choke point.

data.title: Early A Main Dizzy to Grab Ultimate Orb
data.description: Use this Dizzy to grab the Ultimate orb in A Main early in the round. If you think the enemy team might be setup for this, ask a teammate to push with you.
